Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Hairless \Hair"less\, a. Destitute of hair; bald. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
hairless adj : having no hair or fur; "a Mexican Hairless is about the size of a fox terrier and hairless except for a tufts on the head and tail" [ant: {hairy}]
